name: The City of the Red Pox
name_original: The City of the Red Pox
description:
As the plague season rises to its zenith, the people of Antar rise or fall with it. Nobles settle vendetta three generations in the making. Merchant houses sink one another’s ships in theharbour, as social norms break down around them.

Worse yet, the Princess Dressed in Yellow Silks assaults the

walls of reality. From between the million spheres, where anti-suns  play, she summons horrors untold.

All will be judged.
